channel.title: numpy on mannuan
channel.description: Recent content in numpy on mannuan

item.title: numpy softmax实现
item.description: # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- import numpy as np def softmax(x): x_row_max = x.max(axis=-1) x_row_max = x_row_max.reshape(list(x.shape)[:-1]+[1]) x = x - x_row_max x_exp = np.exp(x) x_exp_row_sum = x_exp.sum(axis=-1).reshape(list(x.shape)[:-1]+[1]) softmax = x_exp / x_exp_row_sum return softmax if __name__ == "__main__": m = np.random.randn(2, 2, 2) + 2 m = softmax(m) m = m.
